alert.note: Alert for Knox; NW Blount; North Sevier; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 6:04PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Knox, northwestern Jefferson, southeastern Union, southwestern Grainger, northwestern Sevier and west central Hamblen Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 703 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Knoxville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Sevierville, Alcoa, Jefferson City, Maynardville, Farragut, Plainview, New Market, Rockford and Strawberry Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Knox; NW Blount; North Sevier; Union
